questions.question: Who was George Washington?
questions.correct: First president of the United States
incorrect: First man to walk on the moon

questions.question: Who was Jane Austen?
questions.correct: Brisith novelist, author of 'Pride and Prejudice'
incorrect: American musician, known as the 'Queen of Soul'
Queen of England during the 16th century
American scientist famous for her work on the Apollo missions

questions.question: Who was Charles Darwin?
questions.correct: Scientist famous for the theory of evolution
incorrect: British Prime Minister during World War I

questions.question: Who was William Shakespeare?
incorrect: American president during the War of 1812
Dutch explorer who found the archipelago of Svalbard

questions.question: Who was Confucius?
questions.correct: Chinese philosopher whose teachings are among the most influential in history

questions.question: Who was Grace Hopper?
incorrect: First female aviator to fly solo across the Atlantic
